text: The 1974 Paris–Tours was the 68th edition of the Paris–Tours cycle race and was held on 29 September 1974. The race started in Tours and finished in Versailles. The race was won by Francesco Moser. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | ~~1~~ | ~~~~| style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 14" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 18" |} |} ==Notes== ==References== Category:1974 in French sport 1974 Category:1974 Super Prestige Pernod
